    def extract_text(self) -> list[str]:
        """
        Extract the text of a picture taken by Camera app
        :return: the text in the form of list

            "take_picture": (AppiumBy.ID, "com.android.camera:id/shutter_button"),
            "view_picture": (AppiumBy.ID, "com.android.camera:id/thumbnail"),
            "long_press_area": get_position(500, 225, 540, 275),

            "full_text_area": (AppiumBy.ID, "com.vivo.vtouch:id/vision_bomb_view_full_text"),
        }
        self.activate_app("camera")
        self.tap(loc["take_picture"])
        self.tap(loc["view_picture"])
        # Call AI tool
        self.driver.tap(loc["long_press_area"], 5000)
        self.driver.tap(loc["extract_text_button"])
